dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
AutoDetectedBrowser: Firefox 1
AutoDetectedOS: Windows 7
IIILanguage: en
IssueType: lr_courtorder
Language: en
companyname: NA
country_residence: US
courtorder_explain: The Circuit Court of Maryland has ordered that all  
records pertaining to Jonathan Ngandjong being a registered sex offender be  
void, stricken, nullified, and destroyed because of an illegal judgment in  
which Jonathan Ngandjong should have never been ordered to do so. I have  
received certification from local, state, and federal officials certifying  
their compliance with the judge's order. All public websites have removed  
the record they had with the exception of www.offendex.com

It has been years that myself and my attorney have attempted to contact the  
website administrator to no avail. They hide their info through WhoIs. When  
we sent info via the contact info provided by their website hosting company  
in Australia they never replied. We have recently informed the FBI because  
they are an out of USA site and a file has been opened.

The section that mandates this removal and that all record be void and  
stricken is the second and last paragraphs.

We respectfully pray that as a last recourse, Google will stop indexing all  
references to Jonathan Ngandjong from http://www.offendex.com to prevent  
any further unfair miscarriage of justice.

Thank You
full_name: Jonathan Ngandjong
geolocation: US
hidden_ctx:
hidden_product: websearch
url_box2_1: http://www.offendex.com
